CROWDSEC_API_KEY.help: Key for the CrowdSec API given by cscli bouncer add.
CROWDSEC_API_KEY.label: CrowdSec API key

CROWDSEC_MODE.help: Mode of the CrowdSec API (live or stream).
CROWDSEC_MODE.label: CrowdSec Mode

CROWDSEC_ENABLE_INTERNAL.help: Enable the analysis of the internal traffic.
CROWDSEC_ENABLE_INTERNAL.label: CrowdSec enable internal

CROWDSEC_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.help: Timeout in milliseconds for the HTTP requests done by the bouncer to query CrowdSec local API.
CROWDSEC_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.label: CrowdSec live request timeout

CROWDSEC_EXCLUDE_LOCATION.help: The locations to exclude while bouncing. It is a list of location, separated by commas.
CROWDSEC_EXCLUDE_LOCATION.label: CrowdSec exclude location

CROWDSEC_CACHE_EXPIRATION.help: The cache expiration, in second, for IPs that the bouncer store in cache in live mode.
CROWDSEC_CACHE_EXPIRATION.label: CrowdSec cache-expiration

CROWDSEC_UPDATE_FREQUENCY.help: The frequency of update, in second, to pull new/old IPs from the CrowdSec local API.
CROWDSEC_UPDATE_FREQUENCY.label: CrowdSec request timeout

CROWDSEC_APPSEC_URL.help: URL of the Application Security Component.
CROWDSEC_APPSEC_URL.label: AppSec URL

CROWDSEC_APPSEC_FAILURE_ACTION.help: Behavior when the AppSec Component return a 500. Can let the request passthrough or deny it.
CROWDSEC_APPSEC_FAILURE_ACTION.label: AppSec failure action

CROWDSEC_APPSEC_CONNECT_TIMEOUT.help: The timeout in milliseconds of the connection between the remediation component and AppSec Component.
CROWDSEC_APPSEC_CONNECT_TIMEOUT.label: AppSec connect timeout

CROWDSEC_APPSEC_SEND_TIMEOUT.help: The timeout in milliseconds to send data from the remediation component to the AppSec Component.
CROWDSEC_APPSEC_SEND_TIMEOUT.label: AppSec send timeout

CROWDSEC_APPSEC_PROCESS_TIMEOUT.help: The timeout in milliseconds to process the request from the remediation component to the AppSec Component.
CROWDSEC_APPSEC_PROCESS_TIMEOUT.label: AppSec process timeout

CROWDSEC_ALWAYS_SEND_TO_APPSEC.help: Send the request to the AppSec Component even if there is a decision for the IP.
CROWDSEC_ALWAYS_SEND_TO_APPSEC.label: Always send to AppSec

CROWDSEC_APPSEC_SSL_VERIFY.help: Verify the AppSec Component SSL certificate validity.
CROWDSEC_APPSEC_SSL_VERIFY.label: AppSec SSL verify
